title: Cole's Photo Gallery
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:paperstack]]

[[module CSS]]
/* Set the new text's content from variable */
#header h1 a::before {
  content: var(--header-title, "COLE'S ");
  font-weight: 300;
  font-size: 1.0 em;
}
#header h2::before {
  content: var(--header-subtitle, "PHOTO GALLERY");
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 1.22em;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="logo"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme%3Apaperstack/lgtrans.png]]
[[/div]]
 
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

Hey! Im [[*user Cole 13]]! And here are some photos I have manipulated for other people's articles and my own!

[[=]]
Head in a Jar Dr. Cole Thereven, as seen in SCP-6170
--------------

author: Cole 13
